K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:403b-0: @403b ;;rgya gar skad du a'arya sh'u rang ga ma sa m'a dhi n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:403b-2: 'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-1: chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-2: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-3: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-4: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong sum khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-5: byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-6: thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa'i ye shes thob pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-8: spobs pa mi zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-9: ting nge 'dzin la shin tu gnas pas mi g-yo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-10: shes rab kyi mig sgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-13: chos zab mo'i tshul la zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-14: bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba tshar phyin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-15: smon lam phun sum tshogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa yongs su bzung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-19: byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-20: snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-22: tshig thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig ston pa shes pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-23: spyod pa yongs su dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404a-24: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-0: ye shes dus gsum la ma chags pa thob @404b pa; khams gsum las mngon par byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-2: chos la mos pa mang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-5: sgra yid du 'ong bas go bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-6: spyod lam thams cad yongs su brtags pa ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-8: mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-9: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i go cha ba gos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-14: brtan pa dang ldan pa sha stag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gtsang zhing dri ma med par yongs su sbyong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-22: dad pa'i spyod lam ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:404b-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan dam pa bkod pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu mnyam par gzhag cing dbang po mi g-yeng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha thams cad kyis bstod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po'i rtse 'dzin brtsegs pa'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che bkod pa rgya mtsho'i blo gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems @405b dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa chen po'i blo gros dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu brtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-10: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-11: gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-14: de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-25: gzi brjid che ba che zhing che ba 'ongs shing lhags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:405b-26: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-0: rgya chen po la mos pa de dag thams cad kyang 'khor der tshogs shing 'khod @406a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de 'di snyam du sems te; gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ji lta bu'i zhu ba zhus pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-3: chos kyi rigs kyang yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-4: dge 'dun gyi rigs kyang shin tu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-5: bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang mog mog por byas par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-6: gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyang shin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-7: sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-8: sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-9: sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-10: sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-11: gang dag phyir mi ldog pa de dag kyang myur du bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406a-12: sems can dmigs pa can thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-0: bdag @406b tu mngon par zhen pa rnams kyang lta ba de dag las bskyod par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-1: sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la mos par 'gyur ba dang; sems can rgya chen po la mos pa rnams kyang mgu zhing mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba kun zhu bar bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-3: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-4: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-5: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-7: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-10: dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phye yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-12: khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:406b-13: zhu ba zhus pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407a-2: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407a-5: phyogs bcur snang ba'i phyir snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407a-6: bdud thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir shes rab rgya chen po grags pas rnam par 'phrul bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407a-7: rang byung gi chos thob pa'i phyir ye shes la dbang du 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407a-8: ma bstan pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407a-9: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar ston pa'i phyir spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407a-10: tshe bskal ba dpag tu med par 'dzin pa'i byir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407a-11: sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos la mos pa rnams la nyan thos kyi theg pa ston par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407a-12: sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la mos pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bston par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-0: sems can theg pa chen po'i chos la mos pa rnams la sangs @407b rgyas kyi theg pa ston par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-1: nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang 'tshal cing 'chad la nyan thos kyi nges par gyur pa la'ang mi 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang 'tshal cing 'chad la rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur pa la'ang mi 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang 'tshal cing 'chad la shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang thob par mi bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-4: nyan thos kyi kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-7: cha byad rnams kyang ston la byang chub kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-11: cha byad rnams kyang ston la sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po dang yang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-12: sa bcu'i stobs bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-14: cha byad kyang ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-15: srid pa tha ma dang ldan pas dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas par yang gda' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir mngal du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-21: byang chub kyi snying po'ang ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:407b-22: shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir byang chub kyang rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-1: 'khor lo bskor ba'ang ston pa nas ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du'ang yongs su ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-2: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir lus 'jig par yang ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-3: smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba'ang ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de gang yang mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rnam par sprul pa'ang ston cing gzugs su mthong ba thams cad kyang ston la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-6: shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-7: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-13: khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-14: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-15: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-16: skye bo phal po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-17: lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408a-21: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-1: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu bar sems pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-5: khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa; sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-7: theg pa chen po 'di la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-8: theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnams su nges par byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-12: chos la phan gdags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos la rang dbang yod pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-14: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sdud pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-18: khyod ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zhu ba zhus pa'i lung bstan pa tshar phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-20: ngas ni skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa go cha chen po bgos pa ma gtogs par 'khor 'di na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-31: nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:408b-32: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri nus pa de ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-3: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan na yon tan gyi bye brag de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-5: de bas kyang shin tu ches khyad par du 'phags pa gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin de ngas khyod la bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-8: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-11: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rnam par sprul pa'ang ston la shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-14: gzugs su ston pa thams cad kyang ston la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las chos rnams 'khrugs par yang mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang 'gro la sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su 'du shes pa'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409a-16: sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad par yang 'gyur la chos kyi dbyings tha dad par yang mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-0: spyod @409b pa thams cad du'ang snang la de dag la spyod pa yongs su dag pa'ang shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-2: mi thams cad kyi bdag po'ang yongs su 'dzin la de dag rgyags shing bag med par 'gyur ba'ang mi skyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-3: bdud kyi yul thams cad kyang ston la bdud kyi las la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-4: khams gsum thams cad du'ang spyod la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin shes pa las kyang mi g-yo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-7: 'gro ba thams cad du'ang skye la 'gro ba sna tshogs su 'du shes pa'ang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-8: chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyang ston la yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-9: chos kyi tshul rtogs pa las kyang mi g-yo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-10: gcig tu mnyam par yang bzhag la sems can yongs su smin par byed par spyod par yang snang la mi zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-11: mi skye ba la bzod pa dang yang ldan pa chos rnams kyi skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-13: thams cad du ma zhum pa'i phyir seng ge'i rtsal gyis kyang 'gro zhing 'jig rten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-14: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba thams cad na'ang snang la padma bzhin du mi chags pa'i phyir rtag tu chos kyi kun dga' mchog la dga' zhing mos par yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:409b-15: de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-1: cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-2: bdag cag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming tsam yang sngon ma thos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-3: rgya cher rnam par phye zhing bshad pa lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-4: gang bdag cag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming thos pas na bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-6: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-8: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ste bshad pa 'di thos nas mos shing yid ches la dad pa de dag the tshom med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-9: gang dag thos nas len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-12: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-13: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-14: de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta ci smos snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-15: de nas brgya byin dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-18: lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-19: gang bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khri gang la bzhugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa'i chos kyi khri /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-2: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i khri'i seng ge'i khri nges par bsham par bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-3: khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas dpa' par 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-4: de nas lha'i bu re re zhing yang bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri shom gyi gzhan ni ma yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-5: de nas lha'i bu dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-8: 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rang rang gis seng ge'i khri sna tshogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-13: ras bcos bu rgya stong du ma bting ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-14: steng gi bar snang las rin po che'i gdugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-16: dra bas g-yogs pa; khor khor yug tu rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-17: g-yas g-yon du rin po che'i shing ljon pa du mas brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-18: dar gyi lnga ldi bres pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-19: mu tig gi phreng ba dbyangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-24: gser gyi dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas g-yogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-25: me tog sna tshogs bkram pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:410b-30: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i rgyan gyi bkod pas legs par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-4: spos thams cad kyis bsgos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-5: me tog sna tshogs gtor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-6: snying po dam pa dang ldan pa'i phog por nas bdug pa bshams par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-7: de ltar de'i skad cig than cig yud tsam la de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bshams par gyur kyang 'khor dang sa chen po la sgrib par yang mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-8: lha'i bu gcig gis lha'i bu gcig shos kyi khri bshams pa'ang ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-9: lha'i bu re re zhing yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bshams pas bdag gi seng ge'i khri la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-10: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-14: de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bshams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-15: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-17: bdag gi seng ge'i khri 'di la bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-18: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-0: seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad @411b cu rtsa bzhi po de la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-1: seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa dag bzhugs par snang ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-2: de na lha'i bu re re zhing bdag bdag gi seng ge'i khri de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par mthong gi phan tshun du gcig gis gcig gi khri ni ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-3: de na brgya byin re re zhing brgya byin gnyis pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyi ltos shig ces ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyi ltos shig ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-9: de bzhin du brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-11: 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-12: lha de dag thams cad kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyi ltos shig ces ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-15: de na re re zhing yang re re dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'chad pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyi khyod kyi la ni ma yin no zhes de skad ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-18: 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:411b-19: lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412a-1: bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang brtsam pa tsam bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412a-2: theg pa chen po yongs su bsdu ba'ang bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe ci nas kyang brgya byin dang; tshangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412a-3: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412a-4: lha'i bu de dag gis seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzhugs par mthong ba de lta bu'i ltas bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412a-5: de na 'khor de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas bdag bdag gi stan de dag las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412a-6: thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412a-9: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu 'di dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412a-11: de ltar lha'i bu ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri bshams pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412a-12: thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-0: bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi @412b pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-1: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-2: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-3: sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-14: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-15: gang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-16: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-17: sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i dam pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-18: de nas tshangs pa'i 'khor de'i nang nas tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:412b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa gang bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:413a-0: gang gzhan gyi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa @413a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:413a-6: rnam par sgrub pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid byed pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-006:413a-7: yongs su rtog pa las byung ba ste /
